channel.title: Networking and Filesharing on a Home Network
channel.description:
Howdy. I uh, hate networking.
So I've got two computers. I will refer to the computer that has the internet connection and WinXP Pro sp2 as "this" computer. The computer that has Win 98SE and is linked to this computer through a length of ethernet cable will be reffered to as "other" computer.
So this computer is connected to the internet through a wireless card. I've got an rj45(ethernet) cable running between the two. I'm trying to share the two hard drives (able to acces this hard drive from other's hard drive and vice versa.)
I ran the connection wizard several times, googled keywords, installed new and rolled back drivers, tapped my shoes.... I finally got the internet working on other computer. Fairly sweet I think.
The problem is the file sharing. Windows shows no other users in my WORKGROUP, which is impossible because I can ping this computer from other computer (and vice versa) and I have an internet connection on other computer.
Here's a diagram that might help for visual people, plus I rambled a bit. [URL=http://img397.imageshack.us/my.php?image=untitledxz0.jpg][IMG]http://img397.imageshack.us/img397/2448/untitledxz0.th.jpg[/img][/URL]

item.title: Networking and Filesharing on a Home Network

item.description:
@Aukake wrote:

Howdy. I uh, hate networking.

So I’ve got two computers. I will refer to the computer that has the internet connection and WinXP Pro sp2 as “this” computer. The computer that has Win 98SE and is linked to this computer through a length of ethernet cable will be reffered to as “other” computer.

So this computer is connected to the internet through a wireless card. I’ve got an rj45(ethernet) cable running between the two. I’m trying to share the two hard drives (able to acces this hard drive from other’s hard drive and vice versa.)

I ran the connection wizard several times, googled keywords, installed new and rolled back drivers, tapped my shoes… I finally got the internet working on other computer. Fairly sweet I think.

The problem is the file sharing. Windows shows no other users in my WORKGROUP, which is impossible because I can ping this computer from other computer (and vice versa) and I have an internet connection on other computer.

Here’s a diagram that might help for visual people, plus I rambled a bit.
